attributes.title: Don’t download!!
attributes.review: This app took four hours to download and when I was finally able to open it up, the app kept glitching and closing out. How unprofessional! I waited four hours of my time waiting for thus piece of garbage. When it worked for a few seconds, all I was able to see was an orange face 🟠. In my opinion, not worth your time, not worth your space, not worth your data.

attributes.title: TRUMP 2020✨💫🤡

I’m still wondering why we haven’t built a wall😐 I was expecting for MY president to have higher interest in doing this ✨💫 .This app also made my phone glitch and show MY president on my screen all deformed, I was trying to put in a register and it logged me out😔 i NEED for you to fix this please and BUILD THAT WALL👁👄👁💫✨🟠

attributes.title: don’t download this app...
attributes.review: So I wanted to download this app because I wanted to support the orange god who definetly didn’t make the world 100 times worse ✨. Anyways when I downloaded this app  my phone was glitching like crazy! And now every time I open up my phone there is the orange god  🍊👄🍊 as my wallpaper which is very odd.... so I’m going to get a new phone.... hopefully the trumpets aren’t mad that I am going to delete this app....

attributes.title: Violated
attributes.review: The past few months I’ve been torn on who to vote for, so I downloaded this app to see if it could help sway my opinion. Turns out, this app and its content are absolute GARBAGE. I just can’t comprehend how anything portrayed on this app is real. It really disappoints me that THIS is the guy people want to run our country. He is rude, and threatens to violate the 1st amendment. Not only that but he’s a vile person with weak political stances. Plus the app is just spasmodic 😂

attributes.title: What a joke of a app.
attributes.review: This is literally one of the dumbest dudes in the world. Like everything that comes out his mouth just sounds dumb as hell. Like I lose literally braincells. The fact people support this clown is hilarious. This is our country.... Also this dude is sick. Also this app causes vomiting...... 🤮🤮🤮🤮. After I used this app my anus started itching like crazy. My tongue got horrible rashes. And my hair started falling out.... yeah dont but this app.

attributes.title: TikTok
attributes.review: Don’t even THINK about banning TikTok in the US. This president is trying to silence gen z and it won’t happen, no matter how hard he tries. Fascism is not a good look for America Donald, and we are much more powerful than you’ll ever think. So please stop trying to stop us and remind yourself that YOU are the real villain here. That’s why you’re losing support. So sit back and watch yourself get clowned again, and be the sore loser you are ;)
